alert.note: Alert for Petersburg Borough; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 20 at 5:25AM AKST until November 20 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...STRONG WINTER STORM WILL BE IMPACTING THE NORTH AND CENTRAL PANHANDLE... As of 5 am, snow has started from Juneau and Hoonah southward with Angoon already seeing visibilities below 1 mile due to snow. Snow will continue to spread northward through the morning with visibilities steadily falling as snow rates increase. In addition outflow winds have been increasing steadily overnight. Downtown Juneau in particular has seen gusts to 70 mph already this morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Petersburg Borough and Western Kupreanof Island and Kuiu Island. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will change to rain during the morning hours. The greatest snow accumulations will occur in areas at elevation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Petersburg Borough; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
